meanings.definition: A person who transcribes spoken or recorded information into written form.
meanings.sent1: The transcriptionists typed out the doctor's notes accurately.
meanings.sent2: Transcriptionists play a crucial role in converting audio files to text.
meanings.sent3: The transcriptionists had a race to see who could type the fastest!
meanings.sent4: The transcriptionists were like human printers, turning speech into text.
meanings.sent5: The transcriptionists' fingers danced across the keyboard, capturing every word.

meanings.definition: The act or process of transcribing spoken or recorded information into written form.
meanings.sent1: The transcriptionists' job involves converting audio files into text.
meanings.sent2: Accurate transcriptionists ensure that every word is correctly written down.
meanings.sent3: During the meeting, the transcriptionists turned speech into text in real-time.
meanings.sent4: The transcriptionists' work is like translating spoken language into written language.
meanings.sent5: The transcriptionists diligently transcribed the interview, capturing every detail.
